alert.note: Alert for Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 03 at 4:10PM EST until March 04 at 6:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern New Haven, Southern Middlesex and Southern New London Counties. In New York, Northwest Suffolk, Northeast Suffolk, Southwest Suffolk, Southeast Suffolk, Northern Nassau and Southern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London
